result.eng: As far as I know, this is true.
result.ga: a fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.orig: a fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.html: a fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.
result.ponchtml: a ḟad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.

result.html: de réir mo chuimhneAs far as I remember.
result.ponchtml: de réir mo ċuiṁneAs far as I remember.

result.eng: She's married, as far as I know.
result.ga: tá sí pósta go bhfios dom
result.orig: tá sí pósta go bhfios dom
result.html: tá sí pósta go bhfios domShe's married, as far as I know.
result.ponchtml: tá sí pósta go ḃfios domShe's married, as far as I know.

result.eng: But the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.

result.html: ach tá na blaganna gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maithBut the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.
result.ponchtml: aċ tá na blaganna gaeilge ar fiú iad a léaṁ tearc go maiṫBut the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.

result.eng: The sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ga: d'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.orig: d'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.html: d'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibhThe sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ponchtml: d'éiriġ an ġrian agus noċt na caisleáin óir fá ġiota dóiḃThe sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
